definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: In the official history, encyclopedia belonged to different classifications between Han Dynasty and Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在正史史志目錄中，漢宋之間類書所屬歸類不同。
是很難被歸類到編程問題裏面的。

sentences.english: Cantonese cuisine, the hardest to categorize, emphasizes light cooking with seemingly limitless range of ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 最難歸類的粵菜強調輕炒淺煮，選料似乎不受限制。

sentences.english: The inserted type spine lable, easy to sort out and file.
sentences.chinese: 插式背條，便於工作歸類存檔。

sentences.english: This book is not easily classifiable.
Sort these cards according to [by] their colours.
sentences.chinese: 把這些卡片按顏色歸類。

sentences.english: It is classified as the only species in the genus Pinguinus .
sentences.chinese: 實際進行物種歸類時屬於企鵝種。

sentences.english: Welcome to Social Wallpapering, a community effort to classify, rank, and distribute high-resolution images for use as computer wallpaper.
sentences.chinese: 此網站致力於歸類，評分以及分享高質量的牆紙。

sentences.english: In the morning, I type it into my database of ideas.
sentences.chinese: 早晨，我會把這些整理歸類，存入我的數據庫。

sentences.english: All other gemstones were classified as semi-precious stones.
sentences.chinese: 其他寶石均被歸類爲半珍貴寶石。

sentences.english: Apps can now be grouped into different topics or themes.
sentences.chinese: 現在，應用程序可以以不同的主題來歸類。

sentences.english: Today, such cases are usually summarized under the term intersexuality .
sentences.chinese: 現今，這樣的新生兒通常用中間性的術語予以歸類。

sentences.english: Some scientists relegate parapsychology to the sphere of quackery .
sentences.chinese: 一些科學家把靈學歸類到騙術範圍。

sentences.english: Classify them and explore the source.
sentences.chinese: 對它的詞義構合關係進行歸類探源。

sentences.english: Hence, component frameworks are also classified as event-driven.
sentences.chinese: 因此，組件框架也被歸類爲事件驅動的。

sentences.english: Finally, we can ascertain the threshold value by oil attribute of the wells given.
sentences.chinese: 再根據已知井位的油氣屬性，確定歸類門檻值。

definition: to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to be classified as/to belong to/to be part of
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
